external_references.description: Ahl, I. (2017, June 06). Privileges and Credentials: Phished at the Request of Counsel. Retrieved May 17, 2018.
Grunzweig, J., Lee, B. (2016, January 22). New Attacks Linked to C0d0so0 Group. Retrieved August 2, 2018.

description: [APT19](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0073) collected system architecture information. [APT19](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0073) used an HTTP malware variant and a Port 22 malware variant to gather the hostname and CPU information from the victim’s machine.(Citation: FireEye APT19)(Citation: Unit 42 C0d0so0 Jan 2016)
